summary: A fun-loving couple, finding that they died and are now ghosts, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of a friend of theirs.

Farrell MacDonald|Elaine Shepard|Doodles Weaver|Si Jenks|Three Hits and a Miss|Harry Adams|Ernie Alexander|Irving Bacon|Marvin Bailey|Lionel Belmore|Clem Bevans|Betty Blythe|Ward Bond|Ralph Brooks|James Carlisle|Hoagy Carmichael|Eddy Chandler|Dick Cherney|Dorothy Christy|Davison Clark|Dona Dax|Vince Degen|Lester Dorr|Claire Du Brey|Tom Ferrandini|Eddie Fetherston|Sam Flint|Bess Flowers|Kay Garrett|Anita Garvin|Pat Gleason|Dick Gordon|Herschel Graham|Robert Haines|Kenneth Harlan|Grace Hayle|Tom Herbert|Max Hoffman Jr.|Shep Houghton|George Humbert|William Irving|Sheldon Jett|Eddie Kane|Crauford Kent|Carl M. Leviness|Leota Lorraine|Harold Miller|Jack Mulhall|Frank O'Connor|Jack Perry|Alexander Pollard|Jack Raymond|Cyril Ring|Syd Saylor|Scott Seaton|Bill Seckler|Martha Tilton|Lana Turner|Russell Wade|Walter Walker|Ruth Warren|Billy Wayne|Harry Wilson|Eric Wilton|Claire Windsor
title: Una pareja invisible
